title: Why do the Snowdown Sweets keep disappearing from the shop?
body: It seems like every other day i get on and go to buy the snowdown sweets they are gone from the shop. Why is this happening?

replies.body:
As our [**Snowdown 2016 Crafting Guide**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/snowdown-crafting-2016) mentions:

> *"You can collect Snowdown Sweets from any Hextech Chest during Snowdown (Snowdown Chests contain even more!) or pick them up for IP on the weekends."*

Let me know if you have any other questions.
I didn't know they were only in the shop for ip on _weekends_. So i thought my shop was bugged. Thanks for clearing that up.
They don't want to give up the icons and emotes, so you'll end up buying them!?!?
